Articles.Content:
The X-6 Condor is a new transport plane. Using 6 jet engines to quickly get it off the run way in both fast and short distance. Can Easily take off with a 10 ton payload of fuel making it ideal for rovers, fuel drops or maybe a small plane. plenty of fuel will allow you to go quiet a far distance and if you want more fuel just attach underneath. It also glides smoothly threw the air and may only require minor trim adjustment for perfect flight.

Download

Spaceport

Javascript is disabled. View full album

if you want more pics just ask (like it carrying things)
looks good but where does payload attach? Also, can i see a pic of the plane carrying a large payload?

looks good but where does payload attach? Also, can i see a pic of the plane carrying a large payload?

there's a spot underneath where you can attach and its aligned with center of mass so as long as the payload is centered on there you don't have to worry about rebalancing it

and i just put more pics up of it carrying payloads... unfortunately the beams for the main landing gear are weak and when i tried 20 tones the started to wobble and then boom boom . for once struts couldn't help ........... but i did get it up to 15 with out a problem haven't checked further.

Edited July 16, 2013 by brobel
